content: sea witch scarf 1 of 4 se� wit�� - ten���l� spi��� sca�� materials suggested yarn red heart gemstone 1 ball 312 yds or 285 m yarn weight bulky 5 needle size us 8 5 0 mm gauge 18 sts 24 row = 4in/10cm in stockinette should create a somewhat dense fabric other blocking surface and pins stitch counter or locking stitch markers optional stitch glossary kfb knit into the front then back of the same stitch k2tog insert the righthand needle into the first two stitches on the lefthand needle from left to right then wrap the yarn and pull through as with a normal knit stitch yo bring yarn to the front as if to purl wrap the yarn over the righthand needle to the back then knit this should result in an extra loop of yarn between 2 knit stitches bo1 knit 2 stitches then slip the first stitch over the second stitch mb3 5 7 9 make bobble instructions are as follows 1 knit into stitch but don t pull off of the left needle 2 yo + knit into the same stitch 1 2 3 4 times 3 5 7 9 sts total in bobble 3 drop worked stitch from the left needle 4 turn work purl 3 5 7 9 5 turn work knit 3 5 7 9 6 repeat the last two row 0 1 1 2 more times 7 to finish the bobble pass the second stitch on the right needle over the first stitch 2 4 6 8 times this will produce a tilted bobble 8 press the centre inward to form the sucker shape k4 mb7 k to end number of stitches each repeat row 2 4 6 8 10 bo1 k to last 3 sts kfb k2 set-up row row 3 5 7 9 k2 kfb k to end cast on 3 sts repeat row 1-10 three more times row s1 right side k1 kfb k1 4 repeats total row s2 wrong side bo1 kfb k1 repeat row 3 and 4 once row s3 rs k2 kfb k to end row s4 ws bo1 k to last 3 sts kfb you will have four 7-stitch bobbles k2 you should have 50 sts repeat row s3 and s4 four more times total of 12 row 9 stitch bobbles you should have 9 sts row 1 k2 kfb k5 mb9 k to end row 2 4 6 8 10 12 bo1 k to last 3 sts kfb k2 3 stitch bobbles row 3 5 7 9 11 k2 kfb k to end row 1 rs k2 kfb k1 mb3 k to end repeat row 1-12 once more row 2 4 6 bo1 k to last 3 sts kfb 2 repeats total k2 row 3 5 k2 kfb
